data.title: Näsets Marcusgård – Your Gateway to Swedish Summer Concerts!
data.meta_description: Näsets Marcusgård, your gateway to swedish summer concerts offers the perfect base to explore two open-air concert venues: Dalhalla and Rättviks Gammelgård.
data.text:
As the days grow longer and the sun warms Sweden’s landscape, music lovers across the globe set their sights on unforgettable summer experiences. Näsets Marcusgård, your idyllic home away from home in Dalarna County, offers the perfect base to explore two legendary open-air concert venues: Dalhalla and Rättviks Gammelgård. Näsets Marcusgård, your gateway to swedish summer concerts!

Dalhalla: A Stage Carved from Nature

Just a short drive from Näsets Marcusgård lies Dalhalla, a unique concert venue unlike any other. This former limestone quarry boasts a breathtaking natural amphitheatre, where towering cliffs create an incredible acoustic experience. Throughout the summer, Dalhalla comes alive with a star-studded line-up of concerts featuring everything from iconic rock bands to classical orchestras.

Catch a Legend at Dalhalla

This summer, Dalhalla welcomes the legendary rock group ZZ Top for a four-night residency starting June 28th, 2024. If you’re a fan of classic rock anthems, this is an event you won’t want to miss!

Beyond ZZ Top

Dalhalla’s diverse program offers something for every musical taste. Keep an eye on their website for upcoming concerts throughout the summer.

Rättviks Gammelgård: Intimate Concerts in a Picturesque Setting

Nestled amidst rolling hills and charming villages, Gammelgården offers a more intimate concert experience. This open-air venue boasts a relaxed atmosphere, allowing you to connect with the music under the Swedish summer sky truly.

Emil in Lönneberga

Rättviks Gammelgård, this summer between 13 July and 10 August, the home of the Rättviks culture troupe with the family performance Emil in Lönneberga, a well-known classic by Astrid Lindgren.

Gammelgården & Kafe Nyfiket

Gammelgården in Rättvik is also home to kafe Nyfiket, an ecological oasis that the White Guide lists as a visit-worthy cafe of good class. In addition to running the café, the association organises concerts and other cultural events utilising the exceptional environment that Gammelgården creates. Be sure to check their website for upcoming events during your stay at Näsets Marcusgård.

Näsets Marcusgård: Your Summer Concert Headquarters

Located within easy reach of both Dalhalla and Rättviks Gammelgård, Näsets Marcusgård provides the perfect home base for your Swedish music adventure. After a day filled with exhilarating music, return to the tranquillity of Näsets Marcusgård, where comfortable accommodations and warm hospitality await. Should you need help booking tickets, let us know we are ready to help you with this.

So pack your dancing shoes, dust off your lighter, and book your stay at Näsets Marcusgård. Swedish summer concerts and unforgettable memories are calling!
